alert.note: Alert for Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Marlboro County through 645 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cheraw, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Mccoll, Clio, Wallace, Chavistown, Dunbar and Tatum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern South Carolina.
